item.title: Mass resignation marks a new kind of defiance in the second Trump era
item.description: The Trump team has rarely if ever faced such resistance from within the government, a move that may pave the way for further defiance.

item.title: Tensions over Palestinians at heart of Trump’s Middle East gambit
item.description: Trump’s goals for the Middle East face a major test as Secretary of State Marco Rubio holds talks with leaders in Israel and Saudi Arabia.
